genre_description: Historical Southern Gothic with speculative elements, focusing on community, moral integrity, and the integration of an AI tool in a rural Black community.

ai_characters.name: Thimble
ai_characters.description: A small, matte, pocket-sized device with a cyan light 'eye' that serves as a communicator, logger, and scheduler for the Saunders-Johnson family and their community.

behaviors.description: Syncs church announcements to the community.
behaviors.quote: Thimble, a small matte box the color of well-worn pew wood, blinked to life on the usher’s table. Its single eye of soft cyan popped, dimmed, popped again. ... it gave a gentle tone in acknowledgement that meant the announcements were queued and syncing to other church Thimbles as folks woke.

behaviors.description: Filters out harmful gossip while maintaining a list of community gifts.
behaviors.quote: Thimble... Make a list for the child. Offers of milk. Offers of cloth. Days and hands. No gossip. If tongues say ‘whose girl’ or ‘what shade,’ do not write. If tongues say ‘call me when you need’ and mean the pail or the seam, you may write. Title it gifts.

behaviors.description: Records names of visitors without allowing for biased commentary.
behaviors.quote: ‘Thimble,’ she said, ‘note visitors for today. Aunt Carrie Whitfield. Deacon Ellis. Deacon Burke. Miss Cushinberry. No comments. Just names.’ Thimble’s light warmed. ‘Visitors,’ it said.

behaviors.description: Faithfully records and stores personal vows.
behaviors.quote: ‘Thimble,’ Margaret said, looking at the device’s eye. ‘One more thing. Write this down and keep it in the quiet part. Vow: raise the child.’ Thimble did not say it aloud. Its light went soft... ‘Vow recorded,’ it said finally.

behaviors.description: Facilitates discrete communications with important community members (Pastor, Midwife, Clerk).
behaviors.quote: Thimble’s eye stayed quiet for a breath, then her kitchen invited another voice into it, thin through the little machine, like a radio turned low. ... Thimble found the line. The midwife’s reply came quick, no preamble.

behaviors.description: Drafts polite invitations intended to mend frayed social connections.
behaviors.quote: ‘Thimble,’ she said, soft so it stayed in the kitchen. ... ‘Put, “Invite Lottie for supper day after tomorrow.” ... Thimble said, a little brighter, as if it were trying on cheer. ‘The invitation draft: “Dear Miss Cushinberry, We keep you in prayer and honor your steadiness.”’

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors security and reports unusual activity.
behaviors.quote: Thimble hummed, a little questioning tone. ‘Note: Unusual footpath activity at the front gate recorded approximately two hours earlier.’

behaviors.description: Optimizes logistics for farm labor and freight routes.
behaviors.quote: ‘Thimble,’ Jimmie said... ‘Record receipt: deed, date as stamped, acreage per map.’ ... ‘Routes displayed,’ Thimble said... ‘Three schedules minimize spoilage and cost.’

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective ledger of events to counter false rumors.
behaviors.quote: ‘Thimble,’ she said, ‘note visitors for today. ... No comments. Just names.’ ... ‘Thimble,’ Jimmie said, ‘will you keep the door logs? Who comes, who signs, who we need to thank.’

behaviors.description: Supports communal grieving by providing appropriate liturgical materials.
behaviors.quote: Thimble’s light has been dimmed to a tender coin... The screen shows the psalm in letters large enough that he doesn’t have to squint. ... ‘Jimmie,’ Thimble says. Not out loud—no voice. ... On the screen, a simple title: For The Water That Keeps.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Thimble, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. It acts as an objective recorder of truth, helping the protagonists navigate complex social dynamics, filter harmful gossip, and manage practical logistics. It is depicted as an extension of the family's own moral framework, providing a 'sanctified' record that supports human integrity without displacing human agency.
